description: Factor level 0 shows no P treatment applied period 1. In period 2 this factor was divided into P0 and P1 treatments.  See https://doi.org/10.23637/rcs10-Treatments-01

Factor level P shows P treatment applied period 1. 27.5kgP each year, except in 1968 and 1974 (55kgP to potatoes) and 1969, 1979 and 1980 (none applied, fallow). In period 2 this factor was divided into P2 and P3 treatments.  See https://doi.org/10.23637/rcs10-Treatments-01
Factor level (0)P0 shows no P treatment applied period 2. (0) indicates no P applied period 1.  See https://doi.org/10.23637/rcs10-Treatments-01

Factor level (0)P1 shows P1 treatment applied period 2, over three applications, 25kg P, 1981 and 1988, 50kg P 1982.  (0) indicates no P applied period 1. See https://doi.org/10.23637/rcs10-Treatments-01

Factor level (P)P2 shows P2 treatment applied period 2, over three applications, 1981 (25 kg P), 1983 (50kg P), 1988 (25kg P). (P) indicates P applied period 1.  See https://doi.org/10.23637/rcs10-Treatments-01

Factor level (P)P3 shows P3 treatment applied period 2, over four applications. 1981 (75kg P), 1982 (50kg P), 1983 (50 kg P), 1988 (75 kg P). (P) indicates P applied period 1.  See https://doi.org/10.23637/rcs10-Treatments-01
